Package com.warzone.elements.map

Class MapValidation

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.elements.map.MapValidation
public class MapValidation extends Object
This class will validate the map of the game connection of all countries, continents with their respective countries mapping

  • Constructor Details

    • MapValidation

      public MapValidation(GameMap p_gameMap)
      Constructor of MapValidation
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - the map which you want to validate

  • Method Details

    • getMapValidationStatus

      public boolean getMapValidationStatus()
      This method is used to get the instant status of map validation in the form of boolean. True signifies that the map validation is successful whereas false signifies it wasn't. (Do not call this method before calling the validate method)
      Returns:
      instant status of the validated map in the boolean format

    • validate

      public String validate()
      This is the prime method to validate whole graph it will show the status of validation of map
      Returns:
      the validation result to print based on all the validation criteria like connected countries, connected continent, empty continents.

    • checkAll

      public boolean checkAll()
      method to gather information about all types of validation
      Returns:
      false if all the validation of the Map isn't successful. If everything in map is correct, then it will return true

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected(Country p_firstCountry, Set<Integer> p_countryIds)
      method to validate whether all the countries are traversable or not starting from any one country
      Parameters:
      p_firstCountry - it starts traversing through one country to check the connection of graph
      p_countryIds - it compares with this parameter if all the countries are traversed
      Returns:
      returns the status whether map is connected or not. Returns true if connected.

    • countryIterator

      public Set<Integer> countryIterator(Country p_currentCountry, Set<Integer> p_visitedCountryIds)
      a recursive method that visits all the adjacent country and traverse in the BFS manner to the adjacent countries.
      Parameters:
      p_currentCountry - this is the current country that is being visited for traversing
      p_visitedCountryIds - set of all the countries that are already visited
      Returns:
      p_visitedCountryIds returns the set of visited countries
